Africa's Leading
Decentralized
Content & NFTs Ecosystem
What is Cassava?
Cassava is Africa's leading decentralized content ecosystem, aiming to connect along the value chain of African's content creation and consumption
Creators A new way of monetizing their content protecting their content copyright
Users User's specific positive contributions can be quantified and rewarded
Advertisers Better exposure opportunities, supported by transparent data
Platforms Drive the increase of advertisement income, active users engagement
Cassava's Mission
Maximize the value of African's content IP
Tap & empower the creators of high market potential
Content infrastructure with blockchain technology

Cassava's decentralized content matrix across various dimensions in Africa

MUSIC
VIDEO
NEWS MEDIA
ANIMATION
ART
Cassava's Utility

Voting

Fans economy - preference towards creators & contents, e.g., weekly top ranking list

Staking

Staking amount works as weighting coefficient for extra action-mining reward

Governance

Influence the incentive schemes of the Cassava ecosystem, and the copyright/IP issues

Payment

Use $CSV to pay services related expenses, e.g., advertisement fee, in-app subscription fee

Purchase

Use $CSV to purchase or redeem commodities, gift cards, virtual gifts; bid & buy NFTs

Charity

Users can offer their help to charity activities by donating $CSV

Cassava NFTs

Everyone can issue

Cassava is developing a non-fungible token (NFT), to be integrated with Cassava's content ecosystem.
These Cassava NFTs will be purchasable and user can use Cassava Tokens $CSV to earn.
